TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ListViewGroup extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public NotInheritable Class ListViewGroup Implements ISerializable

summary.span: 表示 控件中显示的一组项。

span.span: Represents a group of items displayed within a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 利用分组功能，您可以创建具有逻辑关系的直观分组 项。The grouping feature lets you create visual groups of logically related items. 每个组都包含一个基于文本的标头，后跟一个水平行和分配给该组的项。Each group consists of a text-based header followed by a horizontal line and the items assigned to that group. 您可以将页眉文本与控件左对齐、右对齐或居中对齐。You can align the header text to the left, right, or center of the control. 如果将 属性设置为以外的值，则将显示分配给控件的任何组 。Any groups assigned to a control appear whenever the property is set to a value other than . 组通过将各项分成有用的类别来帮助用户找到他们所查找的项目。 groups help your users find the items they are looking for by separating the items into useful categories. 你可以创建所需的任何类别。You can create whatever categories you need. 对项进行分组的一种典型方式是按排序方式进行分组。One typical way to group the items is by the way they are sorted. 例如，你可以按项目名称的首字母的字母顺序对项进行分组，或者通过单击详细信息视图中的列标题对列表进行排序，如类型或日期。For example, you can group the items by the initial letter of the item name when they are sorted alphabetically, or by subitems such as type or date when the list is sorted by clicking a column header in the details view. Windows 资源管理器使用这种类型的分组。Windows Explorer uses this type of grouping. 若要使用分组功能，请将一个或多个 对象添加到 控件的集合 。To use the grouping feature, add one or more objects to the collection of a control. 在构造函数中设置组头文本和标题的对齐方式 ，或使用 和属性进行设置 。Set the group header text and header alignment in the constructor, or set them using the and properties. 可以通过在构造函数中指定组 、通过设置 属性或直接将项添加到组的集合，来将项分配给组 。You can assign an item to a group by specifying the group in the constructor, by setting the property, or by directly adding the item to the collection of a group. 所有项都应在显示之前分配给组。All items should be assigned to groups before they are displayed. 未分配给组的任何项都将显示在默认组中，其标题标签为 "DefaultGroup {0} "。Any items that are not assigned to a group will appear in the default group, which has the header label "DefaultGroup{0}". 默认组不包含在 集合中，因此无法更改。The default group is not contained in the collection, and cannot be altered. 它主要用于调试，以确保所有项都已正确添加到组中。It is primarily useful in debugging to ensure that all items have been properly added to groups. 一次只能在一个组中使用一项。An item can only be in one group at a time. 您可以通过 在运行时设置属性或通过将其添加到另一个组的集合来更改项所属的组 ，这会自动将其从上一个组中删除。You can change the group to which an item belongs by setting the property at run time or by adding it to the collection of another group, which automatically removes it from the previous group. > [!NOTE] > 使用组时，插入标记功能处于禁用状态。The insertion mark feature is disabled when using groups. 这是因为分组功能按组成员身份对项进行排序，而插入标记功能用于在未对其项进行排序的控件中进行拖放重定位 。This is because the grouping feature orders items by group membership, while the insertion mark feature is used with drag-and-drop repositioning in a control that does not already order its items. > [!NOTE] > 当应用程序调用方法时，组仅在 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 家族上可用 。 groups are available only on Windows XP and the Windows Server 2003 family when your application calls the method. 在早期的操作系统上，将忽略任何与组相关的代码，且不会显示这些组。On earlier operating systems, any code relating to groups will be ignored and the groups will not appear. 因此，依赖于分组功能的任何代码可能无法正常工作。As a result, any code that depends on the grouping feature might not work correctly. 您可能想要包括一个确定分组功能是否可用的测试，并在其不可用时提供其他功能。You might want to include a test that determines whether the grouping feature is available, and provide alternate functionality when it is unavailable. 例如，当在不支持按组进行排序的操作系统上运行时，可能需要提供备用排序。For example, you might want to provide alternate sorting when running on operating systems that do not support sorting by group. > > 插入标记功能由提供操作系统主题功能的相同库提供。The insertion mark feature is provided by the same library that provides the operating system themes feature. 若要检查此库的可用性，请调用 方法重载，并传入 值。To check for the availability of this library, call the method overload and pass in the value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用 分组功能按详细信息视图中的子项值组织项。The following code example demonstrates how to use the grouping feature to organize items by subitem value in the details view. 这种形式的分组类似于 Windows 资源管理器中使用的分组。This form of grouping is similar to the grouping used in Windows Explorer. 在此示例中，将动态创建组。In the example, the groups are created dynamically. 对于每个子项列，将为每个唯一子项值创建一个组。For each subitem column, one group is created for each unique subitem value. 对于 "父项" 列，将为每个唯一的初始字母创建一个组。For the parent item column, one group is created for each unique initial letter. 单击列标题可将项排序到为该列创建的组中。Clicking the header of a column sorts the items into the groups created for that column. 再次单击同一个列标题会反转组的顺序。Clicking the same column header again reverses the order of the groups. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/CPP/listviewgroupsexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/CS/listviewgroupsexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/VB/listviewgroupsexample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 `ListViewGroup` 在应用程序中使用构造函数，该应用程序在 详细信息视图中按子项值组织项。The following code example demonstrates how the `ListViewGroup` constructor can be used in an application that organizes items by subitem value in the details view. 这种形式的分组类似于 Windows 资源管理器中使用的分组。This form of grouping is similar to the grouping used in Windows Explorer. 在此示例中，将动态创建组。In the example, the groups are created dynamically. 对于每个子项列，将为每个唯一子项值创建一个组。For each subitem column, one group is created for each unique subitem value. 对于 "父项" 列，将为每个唯一的初始字母创建一个组。For the parent item column, one group is created for each unique initial letter. 为每个列创建的组与子项文本或首字母一起存储在哈希表中。The groups created for each column are stored in a hash table along with the subitem text or initial letter. 单击列标题时，此文本值用于将相应列的项与组进行匹配。When a column header is clicked, this text value is used to match items to groups for the appropriate column. 有关完整示例，请参阅 概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/CPP/listviewgroupsexample.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/CS/listviewgroupsexample.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/VB/listviewgroupsexample.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可以检索标题文本，或在运行时更改标头值。Use this property to retrieve the header text or to change the header value at run time. 你还可以在构造函数中设置标头文本 。You can also set the header text in the constructor.

summary.span: 获取一个包含与此组相关联的所有项的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection containing all items associated with this group.
A that contains all the items in the group.

value.span: 如果组中没有项，将返回一个空 对象。

span.span: If there are no items in the group, an empty object is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过在构造函数中指定组 、通过设置 属性或直接将项添加到组的集合，来将项分配给组 。You can assign an item to a group by specifying the group in the constructor, by setting the property, or by directly adding the item to the collection of a group. 所有项都应在显示之前分配给组。All items should be assigned to groups before they are displayed. 未分配给组的任何项都将显示在默认组中，其标题标签为 "DefaultGroup {0} "。Any items that are not assigned to a group will appear in the default group, which has the header label "DefaultGroup{0}". 默认组不包含在 集合中，因此无法更改。The default group is not contained in the collection, and cannot be altered. 它主要用于调试，以确保所有项都已正确添加到组中。It is primarily useful in debugging to ensure that all items have been properly added to groups. 一次只能在一个组中使用一项。An item can only be in one group at a time. 您可以通过 在运行时设置属性或通过将其添加到另一个组的集合来更改项所属的组 ，这会自动将其从上一个组中删除。You can change the group to which an item belongs by setting the property at run time or by adding it to the collection of another group, which automatically removes it from the previous group. > [!NOTE] > 项可以出现在 组的集合中，但如果它不存在于 控件本身的集合中 ，则它不会显示在控件中。An item can be present within the collection of a group, but if it is not also present within the collection of the control itself, it will not appear in the control.
